goals.description: Create advanced cross-language communication and data exchange system
goals.success_criteria: Seamless data exchange between all language SDKs with type conversion, serialization, and protocol translation

goals.description: Implement intelligent language orchestration and workflow coordination
goals.success_criteria: AI-driven language selection, workflow orchestration, and intelligent task distribution across languages

goals.description: Build unified cross-language API gateway and service mesh
goals.success_criteria: Centralized API gateway with service discovery, load balancing, and unified interface across all languages
